getUserAddress(string).details: This function allows anyone to check the wallet address associated with a specific username.

params.username: The username whose wallet address is to be retrieved.

returns._0: The wallet address associated with the username.

updateUserAddress(string,address).details: This function allows an authorized address to update the mapping of username to wallet address.      Only specific addresses (e.g., admin or authorized addresses) can call this function.

params.userAddress: The new wallet address to associate with the username.
params.username: The username whose wallet address needs to be updated.

getUserAddress(string).notice: Retrieves the wallet address associated with a given username.

updateUserAddress(string,address).notice: Updates the wallet address for a given username.
